body.section: Hierarchy ImageGroup is a kind of RelatedImage

section.title: Description
section.p: This calss contains attributes related to the cross-reference that keeps track of which images belong to which group.

stentry.p: This is a cross-reference that keeps track of which images belong to which group, and indicates in which sequence the images are intended to appear.
This is a cross-reference that keeps track of which images belong to which group, and indicates in which sequence the images are intended to appear.
